items.headline: China is the world leader when it comes to rare earths. This can be used this as leverage in a trade war with the U.S.
items.summary_en: China leads the world when it comes to the production and processing of rare earths. That may be a key weapon in its trade battle with the U.S. — and its move to expand export restrictions on those elements shows that China knows it.
